2 swap protocol (1inch API, UniV2 router)Key features:- Any blockchains mainnet or testnet supported by web3py, 1inch or uniswap type router.- 2 swap protocol type supported: - Uniswap version 2 router protocol type - 1inch API v5Other features:- Translate token symbol to contract address via user defined tokenlist format or coingecko api- Connect to web3 automatically (optionn to provide a web3 object)- Approve contract and sign transaction- Quote a given token- Use Base trading symbol like stablecoin- Settings to use the module for your own setup# Install`pip install dxsp`# How to use it```from dxsp import DexSwap dex = DexSwap() #BUY 10 USDC to SWAP with BITCOIN demo_tx = await dex.get_swap('USDT','wBTC',10) print("demo_tx ", demo_tx)```## Example[example](https://github.com/mraniki/dxsp/blob/main/examples/example.py)## Real use case[TalkyTrader, submit trading order to CEX & DEX with messaging platform (Telegram, Matrix and Discord)](https://github.com/mraniki/tt)# Documentation## ðŸš§ Roadmap[ðŸš§ Roadmap](https://github.com/mraniki/dxsp/milestones)## Questions?
